Issue.creator: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Issue.summary: Discovered endpoints are being added as duplicates
Issue.description: When using a connection profile that has peers and orderers assigned to channels and using discovery on the channel, the discovered peers and orderers will be added to the channel. When peers or orderers are requested from the channel, for example when building the event services needed for my organization, a peer will haveÂ two services setup.
